sentences.sContent: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.sContent_eng: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.sCn: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

sentences.sContent: State authorities have ordered cutbacks in deliveries of water from the delta because of the threat to endangered species of salmon and smelt.
sentences.sContent_eng: State authorities have ordered cutbacks in deliveries of water from the delta because of the threat to endangered species of salmon and smelt.
sentences.sCn: 由于鲑鱼和胡瓜鱼这些濒危物种受到威胁，国家当局已经要求消减从该三角洲往外输水的量。

synos.tran: 鲑鱼；[鱼]大马哈鱼；鲑肉色

phrases.pCn: [生]太平洋鲑鱼；大鳞大麻哈鱼；大麻哈鱼属（等于Oncorhynchus）

remMethod.val: sal(跳跃) + mon → 在水中欢快跳跃 → 鲑鱼， 大马哈鱼

trans.tranOther: a large fish with silver skin and pink flesh that lives in the sea but swims up rivers to lay its eggs
